markdownRemark.html: A 5 minute walk from Torremuelle train station on the Fuengirola - Malaga line. Co-ed (5-18 years) day school. English National Curriculum. Students do IGCSEs for ages 14-16, A/S Levels at 17, and A Levels at 18.

frontmatter.title: The British College Benalmadena
